title: The Adventures of David Martin: Guardian of Knowledge

story.text: David Martin, a 19-year-old consultant and instructor, discovers an ancient book emitting a mysterious glow beneath the floorboards of his grandfather’s old study.
Upon touching the book, David gains the power to imbue knowledge instantly. He tests this by helping a struggling student master calculus in minutes.
David decides to use his powers for good, secretly aiding both peers and strangers alike in complex subjects and life advice.
Rumors start swirling about a 'Knowledge Whisperer' who miraculously resolves complicated problems. David stays cautious, masking his identity.
However, a curious journalist named Lisa tracks his actions, confronting David. He shares his secret with her, trusting Lisa to keep his identity safe.
Together, they plan a large-scale event to help the underprivileged community with education and career advice, harnessing David’s powers publicly without revealing him.
The event is a massive success. Stories of the 'Knowledge Hero' spread, inspiring others to value and share wisdom generously.

ending: David Martin continues to uplift his community, proving that true powers lie in sharing knowledge and enabling others.
moral: The real superpower of humanity lies in its capacity to share and grow knowledge for the betterment of all.
